desc: Since 1992 Northern Lites has been making the World's Premier brand of snowshoes. Made in the USA Northern Lites produces the worlds lightest and most durable snowshoes that allows your mind to focus on your surroundings, not what's on your feet. From professionals to beginners we have the highest quality snowshoes.

layout.text: World's Lightest Snowshoes - Made In USA
Winter Is Coming… Are You Ready? Pre-Order Now
